introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: Create Mystical Prophecy Panels with the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator brings the enchanting visual style of Toby Fox's Deltarune to life. Design custom prophecy panels with animated textures, mystical overlays, and authentic game-inspired typography that captures the essence of Deltarune's mysterious prophecies.

items.title: Authentic Deltarune Aesthetics
items.description: Recreate the iconic prophecy panel style from Deltarune with pixel-perfect accuracy, featuring original game textures and fonts.

items.title: Interactive Customization Tools
items.description: Upload images, write prophecy text, and fine-tune visual settings to create unique panels that tell your own mystical story.

items.title: Multiple Theme Variations
items.description: Choose from Default, Susie's Dark World, or The Final Prophecy themes, each with distinct visual characteristics from the game.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator
usage.description: Create your own mystical prophecy in four simple steps with our intuitive generator:

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Choose a black-and-white or monochrome image as your prophecy mask. The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator works best with high-contrast silhouettes.

items.title: Write Your Prophecy
items.description: Enter your mystical text in the prophecy field. Channel the cryptic wisdom of Deltarune's original prophecies or create entirely new predictions.

items.title: Customize Visual Settings
items.description: Adjust image scale, vertical offset, and choose your preferred theme. The generator offers real-time preview for perfect results.

items.title: Download and Share
items.description: Save your completed prophecy panel as a high-quality image. Share your creation with the Deltarune community or use it in fan projects.

prophecyGenerator.name: prophecy-generator
prophecyGenerator.title: Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator
prophecyGenerator.description: Transform your ideas into mystical prophecies with authentic Deltarune visual effects, including animated scrolling textures, ethereal overlays, and the signature pixelated aesthetic that fans love.

features.name: features
features.title: Professional Features for Creative Expression
features.label: Features
features.description: The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator combines authentic game assets with powerful customization tools, giving creators everything needed to craft compelling prophecy panels.

items.title: Animated Visual Effects
items.description: Dynamic scrolling textures and blending effects bring your prophecies to life, just like in the original Deltarune scenes.

items.title: Ghost Image Overlays
items.description: Subtle floating animations add depth and mystery to your uploaded images, creating an otherworldly atmosphere.

items.title: Responsive Pixel Rendering
items.description: Maintains crisp pixel art quality across all screen sizes while preserving the nostalgic aesthetic of Deltarune.

items.title: Custom Font Support
items.description: Uses authentic Deltarune fonts including 8bitoperator and Determination Mono for genuine prophecy text styling.

items.title: Real-time Preview
items.description: See your changes instantly as you create, ensuring your prophecy panel looks exactly as envisioned.

items.title: High-Quality Export
items.description: Download your creations in optimal resolution for sharing on social media or incorporating into fan projects.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator
faq.description: Learn more about creating mystical prophecies with our generator tool.

items.title: What is the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator and how does it relate to the game?
items.description: The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator is a fan-made creative tool that recreates the iconic prophecy panel aesthetic from Toby Fox's Deltarune. It allows fans to design custom prophecy panels using the same visual style, fonts, and animated effects found in the original game's mysterious prophecy sequences.

items.title: What image formats work best with the generator?
items.description: The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator works optimally with black-and-white or monochrome images in PNG or JPG format. High-contrast silhouettes produce the most authentic results, mimicking the ethereal mask effect seen in Deltarune's original prophecy panels.

items.title: Can I use my creations for fan projects or social media?
items.description: Yes! Prophecy panels created with our generator are perfect for fan art, social media posts, and community projects. We encourage sharing your mystical creations while respecting Deltarune's intellectual property and always crediting the original game by Toby Fox.

items.title: What are the different theme options available?
items.description: The Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator offers three distinct themes: Default (classic prophecy style), Susie's Dark World (darker tones with purple accents), and The Final Prophecy (dramatic end-game aesthetic). Each theme includes unique textures and color schemes from different parts of Deltarune.

items.title: How can I achieve the best visual results?
items.description: For optimal results with the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator, use high-contrast images with clear silhouettes, keep prophecy text concise and mystical, experiment with scale and offset settings, and try different themes to match your creative vision. The real-time preview helps perfect your design.

items.title: Is this tool officially affiliated with Deltarune or Toby Fox?
items.description: No, the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator is a fan-made project created to celebrate the artistry of Deltarune. It's not officially affiliated with or endorsed by Toby Fox or the Deltarune development team. All game assets are credited to their original creators, and this tool exists purely for creative fan expression.
